attributes.additional_details:
To regrade the current English exam results which were unfairly downgraded to D when they should have been C.
My son took part in extra lessons to achieve a C Grade but was downgraded to a D which mean't that that he has to retake English at College for  his Fabrication and Welding Apprenticeship.
Unfortunately I have not got the luxury of sending him to a Private School like these decision makers at the Exam Board! This is just not fair! Give my son and all the other well deserved children there correct C Grades!!!
